Title: Requires diversity, inclusion and elimination of bias training for certain medical personnel as part of continuing medical education requirements
Summary: Requires diversity, inclusion and elimination of bias training for physicians, physician assistants and nurses as part of continuing medical education requirements; such training shall be a biennial requirement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring diversity, inclusion and elimination of bias training for certain medical personnel as part of continuing medical education requirements
